attributes.additional_details:
I believe that all people should have the privilege to marry a person who makes them happy.
I feel the government should pull their finger out and legalise the rights for gay couples to marry, forget the plan to legislate it before 2015 we do not want plans we want action, Barack Obama has done much much more in supporting gay rights in America in the short time he has been in power, the British government is a let-down, what about the rights of gay couples? Where do our rights come in to the equation, love is between 2 people whether it be 2 males, 2 females, or a male and a female. We want to be heard and we want equal rights to marry!    Therefor I would like to reinstate this issue, to finalize the result in allowing same sex marriages.
